What I do

I am a self-taught programmer, looking to learn more.

More about me

Transitioned from health care to Software Development. AI technology enthusiast. Life-long learner. Cosmically curious. Love nature-walks with my four-legged furry friend Milo. Always looking for new challenges to take on as I grow my passions and feed my curiosities. Not a fan of negative attitudes. And of course, there is always a better way to do anything.

While I keep busy learning best practices, I am taking interviews in search of a great team & projects that interest me.
